page.title: 13 Lucy's Factory Oxford
page.content: We visited W.Lucy and Co. Ltd. Our first impression was of dirty high windows and dull paint work.We had a short talk with the works manager followed by a tour of the factory. There were many doors,corridors ,large areas and small rooms in the five floors.The floors were clean and tidy and no space was wasted. The deafening noise of machines was very noticeable but we soon got used to it.Men were at work wearing overalls and heavy boots.We saw a man checking a power transformer and a man applying a protective film of powder paint.We watched a man demonstrate a safety device on a machine:an infra red beam was used.Some machines use a cooling liquid to stop them over heating.The main work force was men but some women and disabled people were employed.
